bibl.title: Callimachus. Hymn to Demeter. Edited with an Introduction and Commentary. (Cambridge Classical Texts and Commentaries. 27.)
bibl.note: Commente les fragments papyrologiques de l'Hymne: P. Ant. III, 179, fr. 2; P. Oxy. XIX, 2226, col. 1-4; XX, 2258A, fr. 9(c) (= Pack2 194 et 186). Voir aussi pp. 32-35: Mysteries at Alexandria?
Hopkinson N., Callimachus. Hymn to Demeter. Edited with an Introduction and Commentary. (Cambridge Classical Texts and Commentaries. 27.)
